casebody.data:
No. 74297 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JANUARY 17, 2019

U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION AS TRUSTEE FOR the CERTIFICATE HOLDERS OF STRUCTURED ASSET MORTGAGE INVESTMENTS INC. Bear Stearns Alt-A Trust, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2006-3; and National Default Servicing Corporation, Appellants,
v.
BOURNE VALLEY COURT TRUST, Respondent.

REVERSED. REMAND.
